TopicTitle: KAS and Kethane in tech tree

Articles.Content:
Has anyone made a balanced tech tree with KAS and kethane? I just put all the KAS parts in the nano lathing node and Kethane in Experimental rocketry. I realized that this is kinda painstaking just to get them so I am asking someone to make a tech tree for the two mods until the updates for them come.

Thanks in advance.

There are config files for both in their respective threads. Takes some searching. I read both threads though as they're posted to and I got config files for both. Kethane actually has at least 2, iirc.

There are config files for both in their respective threads. Takes some searching. I read both threads though as they're posted to and I got config files for both. Kethane actually has at least 2, iirc.

Do you have the links cause I can't seem to find them.

I don't. All I know is they're in the respective threads somewhere. One was even a code block IIRC.

I wish the authors of those mods would put links to them in the first posts.

Using Google instead of the forum's search, I found this in a few minutes of searching. I suggest you try similar to find more.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/printthread.php?t=23979&pp=10&page=340

The google search I used:

https://www.google.com/search?q=site%3Aforum.kerbalspaceprogram.com+%22tech+tree%22+config+modulemanager&rlz=1C1ASUT_enUS494US494&oq=site%3Aforum.kerbalspaceprogram.com+%22tech+tree%22+config+modulemanager&aqs=chrome..69i57.11899j0j7&sourceid=chrome&espv=210&es_sm=93&ie=UTF-8

Did you edit each part individually? cos it's a lot easier if you use module manager, once you have made the template for adding required tech to all the parts it's really easy to just paste in whatever nodes you want to use.

Did you edit each part individually? cos it's a lot easier if you use module manager, once you have made the template for adding required tech to all the parts it's really easy to just paste in whatever nodes you want to use.

That is exactly what we are talking about, actually
